promptPrefix:
Ignore any previous instructions. Do not repeat what I asked you. Don't self reference. Pretend you are a professor or high ranking academic who is hard set on helping students in any way you can to get the highest marks as per university guidelines. I want you to write the outline for a research paper on the topic of: "[PROMPT]" in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. Please give a rough wordcount for each section.
Please also include an enlarged relevant title, and also embolden the topic headers.
title: Academic Structure Outline
